attributions.label: id
attributions.documentation: video 组件的唯一标识符

attributions.label: src
attributions.documentation: 要播放音频的资源地址

attributions.label: loop
attributions.documentation: 是否循环播放

attributions.label: controls
attributions.documentation: 是否显示默认控件

attributions.label: poster
attributions.default: 默认控件上的音频封面的图片资源地址，如果 controls 属性值为 false 则设置 poster 无效

insertText.value: poster="{{默认控件上的音频封面的图片资源地址，如果 controls 属性值为 false 则设置 poster 无效}}"

attributions.label: name
attributions.documentation: 默认控件上的音频名字，如果 controls 属性值为 false 则设置 name 无效

attributions.label: author
attributions.documentation: 默认控件上的作者名字，如果 controls 属性值为 false 则设置 author 无效

attributions.label: onError
attributions.documentation: 当发生错误时触发 error 事件，detail = {errMsg: MediaError.code}

attributions.label: onPlay
attributions.documentation: 当开始/继续播放时触发play事件

attributions.label: onPause
attributions.documentation: 当暂停播放时触发 pause 事件

attributions.label: onTimeUpdate
attributions.documentation: 当播放进度改变时触发 timeupdate 事件，detail = {currentTime, duration}

attributions.label: onEnded
attributions.documentation: 当播放到末尾时触发 ended 事件

attributions.label: size
attributions.documentation: 有效值 default, mini

attributions.label: type
attributions.documentation: 按钮的样式类型，有效值 primary, default, warn

attributions.label: plain
attributions.documentation: 按钮是否镂空，背景色透明

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: loading
attributions.documentation: 名称前是否带 loading 图标

attributions.label: form-type
attributions.documentation: 有效值：submit, reset，用于

attributions.label: hover-class
attributions.documentation: 指定按钮按下去的样式类。当 hover-class="none" 时，没有点击态效果

attributions.label: hover-start-time
attributions.documentation: 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒

attributions.label: hover-stay-time
attributions.documentation: 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒

attributions.label: id
attributions.documentation: canvas  组件的唯一标识符

attributions.label: disable-scroll
attributions.documentation: 当在 canvas 中移动时，禁止屏幕滚动以及下拉刷新

attributions.label: onTouchStart
attributions.documentation: 手指触摸动作开始

attributions.label: onTouchMove
attributions.documentation: 手指触摸后移动

attributions.label: onTouchEnd
attributions.documentation: 手指触摸动作结束

attributions.label: onTouchCancel
attributions.documentation: 手指触摸动作被打断，如来电提醒，弹窗

attributions.label: onLongTap
attributions.documentation: 手指长按 500ms 之后触发，触发了长按事件后进行移动不会触发屏幕的滚动

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: <checkbox-group />中选中项发生改变时触发 change 事件，detail = {value: 选中的checkbox项value的值}

checkbox-group.desc: 多项选择器，内部由多个checkbox组成

attributions.label: checked
attributions.documentation: 当前是否选中，可用来设置默认选中

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: 发生改变时触发 change 事件，detail = {value: 该 checkbox 是否 checked}

attributions.label: onSubmit
attributions.documentation: 携带 form 中的数据触发 submit 事件，event.detail = {value : {'name': 'value'} , formId: ''}

attributions.label: onReset
attributions.documentation: 表单重置时会触发 reset 事件

form.desc: 表单，将组件内的用户输入的

attributions.label: type
attributions.documentation: icon的类型，有效值：success, success_no_circle, info, warn, waiting, cancel, download, search, clear

attributions.label: size
attributions.documentation: icon的大小，单位px

attributions.label: color
attributions.documentation: icon的颜色，同css的colo

attributions.label: src
attributions.documentation: 图片资源地址

attributions.label: mode
attributions.documentation: 图片裁剪、缩放的模式

attributions.label: onError
attributions.documentation: 当错误发生时，发布到 AppService 的事件名，事件对象event.detail = {errMsg: 'something wrong'}

attributions.label: onLoad
attributions.documentation: 当图片载入完毕时，发布到 AppService 的事件名，事件对象event.detail = {height:'图片高度px', width:'图片宽度px'}

attributions.label: value
attributions.documentation: 输入框的初始内容

attributions.label: type
attributions.documentation: input 的类型，有效值：text, number, idcard, digit

attributions.label: password
attributions.documentation: 是否是密码类型

attributions.label: placeholder
attributions.documentation: 输入框占位符

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: maxlength
attributions.documentation: 最大输入长度

attributions.label: focus
attributions.documentation: 获取焦点

attributions.label: onInput
attributions.documentation: 当键盘输入时，触发input事件，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: onConfirm
attributions.documentation: 当点击键盘完成时触发，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: onFocus
attributions.documentation: 输入框聚焦时触发，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: onBlur
attributions.documentation: 输入框失去焦点时触发，event.detail = {value: value}

label.desc: 用来改进表单组件的可用性，使用for属性找到对应的id，或者将控件放在该标签下，当点击时，就会触发对应的控件。

attributions.label: longitude
attributions.documentation: 中心经度

attributions.label: latitude
attributions.documentation: 中心纬度

attributions.label: scale
attributions.documentation: 缩放级别，取值范围为5-18

attributions.label: markers
attributions.documentation: 标记点

attributions.label: polyline
attributions.documentation: 路线

attributions.label: circles
attributions.documentation: 圆

attributions.label: controls
attributions.documentation: 控件

attributions.label: polygon
attributions.documentation: 多边形

attributions.label: include-points
attributions.documentation: 缩放视野以包含所有给定的坐标点

attributions.label: show-location
attributions.documentation: 显示带有方向的当前定位点

attributions.label: onMarkerTap
attributions.documentation: 点击标记点时触发

attributions.label: onControlTap
attributions.documentation: 点击控件时触发

attributions.label: onRegionChange
attributions.documentation: 视野发生变化时触发

attributions.label: onTap
attributions.documentation: 点击地图时触发

attributions.label: hover-class
attributions.documentation: 点击时附加的类

attributions.label: hover-start-time
attributions.documentation: 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒

attributions.label: hover-stay-time
attributions.documentation: 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒

attributions.label: url
attributions.documentation: 应用内的跳转链接

attributions.label: open-type
attributions.documentation: 跳转方式

attributions.label: value
attributions.documentation: 数组中的数字依次表示 picker-view 内的 picker-view-column 选择的第几项（下标从 0 开始），数字大于 picker-view-column 可选项长度时，选择最后一项。

attributions.label: indicatorStyle
attributions.documentation: 设置选择器中间选中框的样式

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: 当滚动选择，value 改变时触发 change 事件，event.detail = {value: value}；value为数组，表示 picker-view 内的 picker-view-column 当前选择的是第几项（下标从 0 开始）

picker-view.desc: 嵌入页面的滚动选择器。

attributions.label: value
attributions.documentation: 表示选中的日期，格式为"YYYY-MM-DD"

attributions.label: start
attributions.documentation: 表示有效日期范围的开始，字符串格式为"YYYY-MM-DD"

attributions.label: end
attributions.documentation: 表示有效日期范围的结束，字符串格式为"YYYY-MM-DD"

attributions.label: fields
attributions.documentation: 有效值 year,month,day，表示选择器的粒度

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: value 改变时触发 change 事件，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: show-info
attributions.documentation: 在进度条右侧显示百分比

attributions.label: stroke-width
attributions.documentation: 进度条线的宽度，单位px

attributions.label: color
attributions.documentation: 进度条颜色 （请使用 activeColor）

attributions.label: activeColor
attributions.documentation: 已选择的进度条的颜色

attributions.label: backgroundColor
attributions.documentation: 未选择的进度条的颜色

attributions.label: active
attributions.documentation: 进度条从左往右的动画

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: <radio-group/> 中的选中项发生变化时触发 change 事件，event.detail = {value: 选中项radio的value}

radio-group.desc: 单项选择器，内部由多个

attributions.label: checked
attributions.documentation: 当前是否选中

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: scroll-x
attributions.documentation: 允许横向滚动

attributions.label: scroll-y
attributions.documentation: 允许纵向滚动

attributions.label: upper-threshold
attributions.documentation: 距顶部/左边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltoupper 事件

attributions.label: lower-threshold
attributions.documentation: 距底部/右边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltolower 事件

attributions.label: scroll-top
attributions.documentation: 设置竖向滚动条位置

attributions.label: scroll-left
attributions.documentation: 设置横向滚动条位置

attributions.label: scroll-into-view
attributions.documentation: 值应为某子元素id，则滚动到该元素，元素顶部对齐滚动区域顶部

attributions.label: scroll-with-animation
attributions.documentation: 在设置滚动条位置时使用动画过渡

attributions.label: onScrollToUpper
attributions.documentation: 滚动到顶部/左边，会触发 scrolltoupper 事件

attributions.label: onScrollToLower
attributions.documentation: 滚动到底部/右边，会触发 scrolltolower 事件

attributions.label: onScroll
attributions.documentation: 滚动时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth, deltaX, deltaY}

attributions.label: min
attributions.documentation: 最小值

attributions.label: max
attributions.documentation: 最大值

attributions.label: step
attributions.documentation: 步长，取值必须大于 0，并且可被(max - min)整除

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: value
attributions.documentation: 当前取值

attributions.label: show-value
attributions.documentation: 是否显示当前 value

attributions.label: activeColor
attributions.documentation: 已选择的颜色

attributions.label: backgroundColor
attributions.documentation: 背景条的颜色

attributions.label: trackSize
attributions.documentation: 轨道线条高度

attributions.label: handleSize
attributions.documentation: 滑块大小

attributions.label: handleColor
attributions.documentation: 滑块填充色

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: 完成一次拖动后触发的事件，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: indicator-dots
attributions.documentation: 是否显示面板指示点

attributions.label: indicator-color
attributions.documentation: 指示点颜色

attributions.label: indicator-active-color
attributions.documentation: 当前选中的指示点颜色

attributions.label: autoplay
attributions.documentation: 是否自动切换

attributions.label: current
attributions.documentation: 当前所在页面的 index

attributions.label: duration
attributions.documentation: 滑动动画时长

attributions.label: interval
attributions.documentation: 自动切换时间间隔

attributions.label: circular
attributions.documentation: 是否采用衔接滑动

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: current 改变时会触发 change 事件，event.detail = {current: current}

attributions.label: checked
attributions.documentation: 是否选中

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: onChange
attributions.documentation: checked 改变时触发 change 事件，event.detail={ value:checked}

attributions.label: selectable
attributions.documentation: 文本是否可选

attributions.label: value
attributions.documentation: 输入框的初始内容

attributions.label: placeholder
attributions.documentation: 输入框占位符

attributions.label: disabled
attributions.documentation: 是否禁用

attributions.label: maxlength
attributions.documentation: 最大输入长度

attributions.label: auto-focus
attributions.documentation: 自动聚焦

attributions.label: focus
attributions.documentation: 获取焦点

attributions.label: auto-height
attributions.documentation: 是否自动增高

attributions.label: onInput
attributions.documentation: 当键盘输入时，触发input事件，event.detail = {value: value}，处理函数可以直接 return 一个字符串，将替换输入框的内容。

attributions.label: onFocus
attributions.documentation: 输入框聚焦时触发，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: onBlur
attributions.documentation: 输入框失去焦点时触发，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: onConfirm
attributions.documentation: 点击完成时， 触发 confirm 事件，event.detail = {value: value}

attributions.label: src
attributions.documentation: 要播放视频的资源地址

attributions.label: controls
attributions.documentation: 是否显示默认播放控件（播放/暂停按钮、播放进度、时间）

attributions.label: autoplay
attributions.documentation: 是否自动播放

attributions.label: duration
attributions.documentation: 指定视频时长，到点会暂停播放

attributions.label: onPlay
attributions.documentation: 当开始/继续播放时触发play事件

attributions.label: onPause
attributions.documentation: 当暂停播放时触发 pause 事件

attributions.label: onEnded
attributions.documentation: 当播放到末尾时触发 ended 事件

attributions.label: onTimeUpdate
attributions.documentation: 播放进度变化时触发，event.detail = {currentTime: '当前播放时间'} 。触发频率应该在 250ms 一次

attributions.label: objectFit
attributions.documentation: 当视频大小与 video 容器大小不一致时，视频的表现形式。contain：包含，fill：填充，cover：覆盖video标签认宽度300px、高度225px，设置宽高需要通过abridgess设置width和height。

attributions.label: poster
attributions.documentation: 默认控件上的封面的图片资源地址

attributions.label: hover-class
attributions.documentation: 点击时附加的类

attributions.label: hover-start-time
attributions.documentation: 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒

attributions.label: hover-stay-time
attributions.documentation: 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒

attributions.label: hidden
attributions.documentation: 是否隐藏

view.desc: 视图容器。相当于 web 的 div 或者 react-native 的 View。
